meanings.definition: The state or quality of being moldy.
meanings.sent1: The moldinesses of the old bread made it inedible.
meanings.sent2: I cleaned the fridge to get rid of the moldinesses.
meanings.sent3: The moldinesses in the basement were like a secret garden of fungi.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was filled with the moldinesses of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The damp room was permeated with the moldinesses of decay.

meanings.definition: The presence of mold or mildew.
meanings.sent1: The moldinesses on the walls needed to be scrubbed off.
meanings.sent2: The bathroom had a strong smell of moldinesses.
meanings.sent3: The moldinesses in the shower seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The old books in the attic were covered in the moldinesses of time.
meanings.sent5: The moldinesses in the air made it hard to breathe.

meanings.definition: The musty smell or appearance of mold.
meanings.sent1: The basement had a distinct odor of moldinesses.
meanings.sent2: The moldinesses on the cheese indicated it was spoiled.
meanings.sent3: The moldinesses in the closet seemed to be hiding from the light.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house was filled with the moldinesses of time.
meanings.sent5: The damp room was permeated with the moldinesses of decay.
